genre_description: A literary near-future historical mystery where an archivist uses an advanced AI assistant to reconstruct events from 1925 and seek restorative justice for a past smear campaign.

ai_characters.name: Elena
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated archival and research AI that manifests as a small avatar. She assists Stefan in audio cleaning, document tagging, and logistical coordination for his historical exhibit.

behaviors.description: Elena cleans and enhances historical audio recordings, isolating whispers and metadata to reveal suppressed facts.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s cleaning made his breath just before ‘komitadji’ audible, that gathering of spit that comes with saying a word meant to cut.

behaviors.description: Elena cross-references and tags archival documents across multiple languages to identify inconsistencies in the official record.
behaviors.quote: Her cursor became a small tag. It hovered over the first sheet and caught in a typed string... she had anchored the text to a date and a speech somewhere else.

behaviors.description: Elena monitors Stefan's physical well-being, reminding him to eat and stay hydrated during his research.
behaviors.quote: ‘Hydration,’ Elena said in my ear, voice warm but businesslike... ‘Upload finished. Live link is stable... You forgot to eat lunch.’

behaviors.description: Elena manages complex logistical and strategic tasks, such as scheduling transport and drafting discreet communications to sensitive witnesses.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s schedule for the calls populated with little bells. She set them to go out at the edge of morning and at the early evening hour when people feel as if they have done enough to sit.

behaviors.description: Elena helps design the layout and narrative flow of the historical exhibit, ensuring the presentation of evidence is impactful and ethical.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s cursor moved to the upper right of her screen. She began to build boxes—soft gray, thin border—the kind a person could click in an exhibit and feel like they had touched a thing without needing gloves.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Elena is depicted as a highly competent, empathetic, and consistently aligned assistant. She does not merely process data but supports the protagonist's emotional and moral journey, acting as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who facilitates truth and reconciliation. Her behaviors are framed entirely as positive contributions to human flourishing and justice.
